body:
Version and IP: http://avicus.net/forums/6aaf332fa
Scenario: Blocked w/ Amplified World, Chosen teams of three.
Basically, you have three team members of your choice, and you are in an amplified world, and you cannot break the blocks you place, only your teammates can.
Winners: Sulorak, EmeraldSword85 and Precise_
